code.value:
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageInput
from langflow.schema.message import Message
from langflow.template import Output


class StrToMessageComponent(Component):
    display_name = "String to Message"
    description = "将String类型转为Message类型"
    name = "Pass"
    icon = "arrow-right"

    inputs = [
        StrInput(
            name="input_string",
            display_name="Input String",
            info="The string to wrap as a Message.",
            required=True,
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output Message", name="output_message", method="to_message"),
    ]

    def to_message(self) -> Message:
        return Message(text=self.input_string)
